clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Used as an over the counter antacid L593

contraindications.disease: During overdose magnesium impairs neuromuscular transmission resulting in weakness and hypoflexia L593
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Neutralizes acid in the stomach L593
